titleStmt.title: A proclamation to redresse the mis-imployment of lands, goods, and other things giuen for charitable vses.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Rockingham the xi. of August 1605. in the third yeere of his Maiesties reigne ... .
Especially directed to educational and religious foundations. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
